articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Backed in Britain
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Backed in Britain
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on Jan. 27 made public a statement in support of the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made clear the foreign policy stand of the DPRK government based on independence, peace and friendship in his New Year Address.
					
					 This has its origin in the foreign policy stand taken by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK will proactively strive to boost the relations with different countries in the idea of independence, peace and friendship backed by its self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					 It doesn't allow any interference in its internal affairs nor interferes in other countries' internal affairs.
					
					 For global peace, it is essential for the U.S. to stop interfering in other countries and respect their sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK will make gigantic contributions to ensuring global peace and security.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, Monday gave a reception at his embassy to mark the 58th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 Invited to it were Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission and chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said at the reception that the 7th congress of the Communist Party of Cuba unfolded new tasks for thoroughly implementing the Party's line and building an independent and prosperous country by achieving socio-economic development.
					
					 The brotherly Korean people registered striking successes in the building of a powerful socialist country, holding aloft the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un last year in which the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was held, he added.
					
					 Cuba will as ever maintain the historic relations of friendship provided by Fidel Castro Ruz, Raul Castro Ruz, President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he noted, adding the friendship and unity between the parties, armies and peoples of the two countries will be ever-lasting.
					
					 Kim Yong Dae said in his speech that the victory of the Cuban revolution was a historic event as it brought a bright future to the Cuban people who had groaned, shackled to the chains of dictatorship and subjugation, and paved a way of building a new society.
					
					 The Korean people are regarding all successes being made by the brotherly Cuban people in the building of socialism as their own happiness and wish the latter greater victory in their struggle for implementing the decision made at the 7th congress of the Communist Party of Cuba, he noted.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people would stand by the side of the Cuban people in the common struggle for independence against imperialism and the victory of the cause of socialism and strive to develop the good-neighborly and friendly and cooperative relations with those countries defending independence, guided by the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: officials in Field of Forest Restoration and Land and Environment Protection Meet
articles.content:
Officials in Field of Forest Restoration and Land and Environment Protection Meet
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials in the field of forest restoration and land and environment protection was held at the People's Palace of Culture here on Monday.
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, officials of the party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of party and power organs in provinces, cities and counties and officials in the field of forest restoration and land and environment protection.
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed the successes and lessons gained in the forest restoration campaign and general mobilization for land management last year and discussed measures for achieving greater successes in the work this year.
					
					 Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed deviations manifested in the forest restoration campaign and the general mobilization for land management last year.
					
					 The participants watched a video dealing with last year's forest restoration campaign and general mobilization for land management.

articles.title: Youth Paper Observes Publication of Its 20 000th Issue
articles.content:
Youth Paper Observes Publication of Its 20 000th Issue
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting to mark the publication of the 20 000th issue of newspaper Chongnyon Jonwi took place at the Central Youth Hall on Monday.
					 Present there were officials and journalists, editors and employees of the newspaper and youth and students in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe Sun Chol, editor-in-chief of the paper, made a report there.
					
					 The reporter noted that under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il the newspaper has creditably discharged its mission and duty in the struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of the leader since its inaugural issue was published on April 20, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung made sure that the Order of National Flag First Class was awarded to the youth paper before any other media of the DPRK for publishing it without any single missing issue even during the fierce war in the 1950s and had energetically led the publication of the paper after the war.
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newspaper three times with his insight into the role of the youth paper in developing the Korean youth movement into the one of the leader long ago, providing important guidelines to be always held fast to in the editorial work. 
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un showed deep trust and loving care for the newspaper, seeing to it that its circulation was drastically increased as it is playing a great role in preparing the youth as reserves of the Party and a congratulatory message of the Party Central Committee was sent to it on the occasion of its 70th founding anniversary.
					
					 The reporter called on all the officials, journalists, editors and employees of the newspaper to add shine to the history of the publication of its 20 000th issue under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and faithfully uphold the Party's idea and line of prioritizing the youth with pens of the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (1)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (1)
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- This year will mark the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 On this occasion, the DPRK people are recalling with deep emotion the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in founding the KPA and strengthening it into an invincible regular army.
					
					 On the basis of army-building experience and tradition gained in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, Kim Il Sung developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the KPA within two and a half years after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule and declared its foundation to the world on February 8, Juche 37 (1948).
					
					 Thanks to the foundation of the regular revolutionary armed forces with all services and arms, the DPRK could have won victory after victory.
						 
					
					 Juche-oriented System for Training Backbones of Regular Army
						  
						 After the liberation of the country, the President set forth the foundation of the Juche-oriented people's armed forces as one of three tasks facing a new Korea and put forward a line to found a regular army embracing sons and daughters of workers, peasants and other working people with the KPRA as its backbone on August 20, 1945.
					
					 He directed primary attention to setting up bases for training military and political cadres and to training the backbone of regular army.
					
					 In November 1945, he personally chose a site for the Pyongyang Institute in the then Jiul-ri, Ryonggang County, South Phyongan Province and gave precious instructions arising in establishing the institute.
					
					 Under his energetic guidance, the Pyongyang Institute came into being as a model base for training military and political cadres for the first time in Korea within three months after the country's liberation.
					
					 The President became the honorary president of the institute and gave the first lecture in January 1946. He also attended the opening ceremony of the institute and delivered a congratulatory speech in February.
					
					 He took measures to set up the Central Security Officers Training School to train military cadres of all branches of arms and services.
					
					 He also saw to it that the Marine Security Officers Training School in July 1947 was established to train a number of naval cadres well versed in navigation, engine, naval artillery and other expert skills.
					
					 Juche-based military regulations, training manuals and teaching programs were set at newly established institutions to give Korean-style military and political education and conduct combat drills.
					
					 Under the warm care of the President, many military and political graduates from those training bases came to be hard core elements of all services and arms of KPA.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying Forward Revolutionary Traditions of Mt Paektu Forever
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying Forward Revolutionary Traditions of Mt Paektu Forever
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- It is the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with the revolutionary traditions of Mt Paektu, established by President Kim Il Sung and glorified by leader Kim Jong Il, as eternal treasure of the Korean revolution, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an editorial.
					 Noting that the revolutionary traditions of Mt Paektu are the historic roots of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution and their lifeblood, the editorial goes on:
					
					 The path of the Korean revolution making long strides under the leadership of the Party means the march of Mt Paektu, the road of Juche paved by the great leaders.
					
					 Our revolutionary forerunners were passionate persons who showed in practice how to uphold their leaders at the dawn of the revolution and in its arduous periods.
					
					 Revolutionary comradeship displayed in sharing intention and destiny on the road of the revolution is the basis of single-minded unity and strong driving force of our revolution. 
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu serves as the main source of the great mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 There will be neither difficulties insurmountable nor fortress unconquerable for us and the final victory in the drive for building a socialist power is sure to be won when we advance with the revolutionary spirit of Paektu as eternal lifeline and treasure.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the people to work hard for the victorious advance of the socialist cause, the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt Paektu, under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails Dangerous Military Drill of U.S., Japanese and S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails Dangerous Military Drill of U.S., Japanese and S. Korean Warmongers
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Days ago the U.S. together with Japan and south Korea staged a missile warning drill under the eyes of the DPRK with Aegis ships involved. It was reportedly aimed to detect and track missiles and share intelligence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary brands the drill as a dangerous saber-rattling to drive the situation on the Korean peninsula to the phase of confrontation.
					
					 The U.S. is seeking a war, not peace, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the invariable ambition and strategy of the U.S. to militarily stifle the DPRK and advance into the continent.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to carry out this scenario by tightening the military alliance with its vassal forces. It is designed to round off the triangular military alliance at any cost in a bid to hurl its vassal forces and thus swallow up the DPRK with their collective military muscle. 
					
					 This brought to light the true colors of the U.S. as the arch criminal escalating the tension and disturbing peace in the Korean peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is the bold guts, spirit and mettle of the DPRK to retaliate against the enemy's dagger with a sword and his rifle with an artillery piece.
					
					 The DPRK will take a series of strong countermeasures in succession to protect the sovereignty of the country, the dignity of the nation and peace in the Korean peninsula and the region unless the U.S. stops saber-rattling against it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hits out at S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hits out at S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Hong Yong Phyo, south Korean minister of Unification, at a recent plenary meeting of the political advisory committee of the ministry praised traitor Park Geun Hye who is more dead than alive, talking about "consistent policy" and "tireless efforts made for progress in the denuclearization of the north."
					 He zealously shielded the confrontation policy of the old witch of Chongwadae, touting "the foundation established for peace and peaceful reunification." When he appeared at a "gathering of homesick people" held at Rimjin Pavilion a few days later, he cried out for "leading the north to changes" together with the international community, deliberately falsifying the truth in a bid to create impression that the issue of divided families and relatives from the north and the south has not yet been settled due to the DPRK.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					 What traitor Hong uttered to stoke confrontation in disregard of time and place is reminiscent of a psychopath's hysteric fit.
					
					 Ministers have been replaced for tens of times since the ministry of Unification appeared in south Korea but there has not been such halfwit as Hong.
					
					 He has only danced to the tune of traitor Park's confrontation policy, being utterly ignorant of the north-south ties and without his own view on the reunification issue.
					
					 His reckless tongue-lashing only brings to light his wretched plight as he is fated to meet the same miserable end as Park's before long.

articles.title: 14th All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
14th All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The 14th all-people action was launched across south Korea on Feb. 4 under the sponsorship of the emergency people's action for the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime, according to media reports.
					 Up to 420 000 people of all strata attended the action.
					
					 There took place a candlelight rally "Day of the 14th all-people actions for impeaching Park Geun Hye within February, ousting Hwang Kyo An, detaining accomplices and realizing reform through candlelight" at the Kwanghwamun Plaza, Seoul.
					
					 A meeting held outside the puppet Seoul Central District Court condemned the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for slowing the trial of her impeachment.
					
					 The fascist security authorities deployed over 14 000 police of 176 companies to crack down on demonstrators.

articles.title: S. Korea: Puppet Group Denounced for Denying Search in Chongwadae
articles.content:
S. Korea: Puppet Group Denounced for Denying Search in Chongwadae
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The people's emergency action to bring down Park Geun Hye "regime" held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 3 to accuse the puppet group of denying the search in Chongwadae, according to the south Korean online newspaper Thongil News.
					 At the conference speakers referred to the fact that those concerned with the special investigation failed to enter Chongwadae for search on the same day, due to its staff members' obstruction.
					
					 They said that Chongwadae is not an office for the "president" but a place where hideous crimes were planned and evidence proving them is preserved.
					
					 They urged Hwang Kyo An to take a necessary measure to ensure the search inside Chongwadae in his capacity, saying that the denial of the search is an illegal act.
					
					 The above-said organization issued a statement in demand of the punishment of those obstructing the search and enforcement of the search warrant.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Introduced in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Introduced in Peru
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian publishing house published in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on the Work of the Central Committee on Jan. 27.
					 The report, made by him on May 6 and 7, Juche 105 (2016), comprehensively deals with the proud achievements and valuable experience made by the WPK in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the great leaders.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways of holding fast to the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the WPK, accomplishing the cause of socialism, achieving the independent reunification of the country and global independence and steadily strengthening the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia on Jan. 30.
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the party, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on this anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Guinea
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Conakry on Jan. 26.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Czech preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Prague on Jan. 24.
					 Jozef Servista, vice-chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il from Jan. 24 to Feb. 20.

articles.title: Statement of Int'l Preparatory Committee for "Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu" Hailed in Japan, Brazil
articles.content:
Statement of Int'l Preparatory Committee for "Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu" Hailed in Japan, Brazil
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Japanese and Brazilian bodies issued statements on Jan. 20 and 29 in support of an official statement issued by the International Preparatory Committee for "Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu".
					 The Japanese preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il said in a statement:
					
					 We will launch positive activities for improving the relations between Japan and the DPRK, bearing in mind the exploits the great persons of Mt Paektu performed for global independence, peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the cause of Korea's independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 We will hold diverse events including the Japan-DPRK friendship meeting for celebrating the birth anniversaries of the great leaders across Japan and inform the Japanese of the Korean people's struggle for fulfilling the five-year strategy for national economic development by dint of single-hearted unity and self-reliance and self-development under the guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We also will contribute to the successful holding of the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and the erection of the Monument to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and join hands with the friendship and solidarity organizations with the Korean people across the world.
					
					 The Brazilian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association praised the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It said that today Kim Jong Un's leadership has made us feel the same greatness of a commander of Paektu identical to that of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It noted that Kim Jong Un is creditably carrying forward the ideology and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to further develop the DPRK.
					
					 It extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people under his outstanding guidance.
